title: A Short portrait of Dennis Spiteri
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television and Jarrod Factor
brief_description: This brief snapshot portrait of Dennis Spiteri captures the essence of the Melbourne artist through a montage of graphic images. Written and directed by Jarrod Factor with original music also by Jarrod Factor.
creator_credit_for_label: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television and Jarrod Factor
